<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AISearchSourceRefQualUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This util class is used to limit the ais search source that can be selected in sys_search_filter and sy_search_source_filter table. The constraint is that selectable ais search sources must come from the same search profile as the sys_search_filter/sys_search_source_filter through sys_search_context_config which links to search profile.</description>
        <name>AISearchSourceRefQualUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AISearchSourceRefQualUtils = Class.create();
AISearchSourceRefQualUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getRefQualForSearchFilter: function(current) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('ais_search_profile_ais_search_source_m2m'); 
		gr.addQuery('profile', current.search_context_config.search_profile);
		gr.addQuery('search_source.active', true);
		gr.query();
		var ids=[];
		while (gr.next()) {
			ids.push(gr.search_source.sys_id);
		}
		var result = 'sys_idIN' + ids.join(",");
		return result;
	},
	
	getRefQualForSearchSourceFilter: function(current) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('ais_search_profile_ais_search_source_m2m'); 
		gr.addQuery('profile', current.search_filter.search_context_config.search_profile); 
		gr.addQuery('search_source.active', true);
		gr.query();
		var ids=[];
		while (gr.next()) {
			ids.push(gr.search_source.sys_id);
		}
		var result = 'sys_idIN' + ids.join(",");
		return result;
	},

    type: 'AISearchSourceRefQualUtils'
};]]></script>
